survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with In-Office Wellness Amenities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee satisfaction and preferences regarding wellness amenities provided in the office, such as fitness centers, meditation rooms, and healthy food options.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current wellness amenities provided in your office?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses. Ensure the scale is balanced with clear labels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current wellness amenities provided in your office?

questions.question_text: Which of the following wellness amenities do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Wellness programs (e.g., yoga classes, health screenings)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture usage patterns. Include an option for non-users.

script.question_text: Which of the following wellness amenities do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Wellness programs (e.g., yoga classes, health screenings)

questions.question_text: What additional wellness amenities would you like to see implemented in your office?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional wellness amenities would you like to see implemented in your office?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the wellness amenities provided in your office?
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q2 does not select 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Frequency question helps understand engagement levels. Use clear timeframes.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Skip if Q2 selects 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: How often do you use the wellness amenities provided in your office?
script.routing_logic: Show if Q2 does not select 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: How much do wellness amenities influence your overall job satisfaction?
questions.client_notes: Helps measure the perceived value of wellness amenities. Use a balanced scale.

script.question_text: How much do wellness amenities influence your overall job satisfaction?
